summary: As an Associate Principal Account Solution Architect at Red Hat, I bring over 20 years of IT experience. Expert in cloud-native architectures, Kubernetes, and enterprise solutions, I advise large enterprise organizations on their digital transformation and open source technology adoption. Passionate about technological innovation and knowledge sharing, I support teams in designing and implementing robust, scalable solutions.

Working in the Enterprise vertical, I support organizations in their digital transformation, focusing on scalability, reliability, and infrastructure security.
